Detailed Description

template<class REQ, unsigned int BUSWIDTH, typename TYPES = tlm::tlm_base_protocol_types>
class ml_tlm2_target_connector< REQ, BUSWIDTH, TYPES >

Template of TLM2 target connector.

Templated by type of the transaction, the bus width and protocol types Implements the methods and tasks needed for ML TLM2 communication
